channel.title: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!
channel.description: better privacy addon recommended for TBB if is installed flash plugin , for deleting cookies, that was great , current version of TBB not support anymore that addon , but there is another similar addon that deleting automating flash LSO's cookies when exiting browser , check it please. http://www.hotcleaner.com/clickclean_firefox.html

item.title: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!
item.dc:creator: anonymityISright
item.description:
Patrick:

And is a good idea the AdBlock Plus addon for whonix like on tails?

No.

You know better anyway (i thing because for chaning fingerprint) No need to post further.
Thanks all of you for posts .

Read full topic
item.source: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!

item.title: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
anonymityISright:

Check and that please: Remove Cookie(s) for Site addon :
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/remove-cookies-for-site/

Don’t use.

Flash cookies will usually not be deleted by cookie clearing add-ons
unless they specifically say so.

And is a good idea the AdBlock Plus addon for whonix like on tails?

No.

Read full topic
item.source: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!

item.title: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!
item.dc:creator: anonymityISright
item.description:
Check and that please: Remove Cookie(s) for Site addon :
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/remove-cookies-for-site/

And is a good idea the AdBlock Plus addon for whonix like on tails? (on Tails is preinstalled) See: Tor Browser 5.5 introduces protection against fingerprinting but due to an oversight it is not enabled in Tails 2.0. However, this is not so bad for Tails users since each Tails system has the same fonts installed, and hence will look identical, so this only means that it’s easy to distinguish whether a user of Tor Browser 5.5 uses Tails or not. That is already easy given that Tails has the AdBlock Plus extension enabled, unlike the normal Tor Browser. Source: https://tails.boum.org/news/version_2.0/index.fa.html#index1h1

Read full topic

item.title: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Ego:

as far as I’m concerned and in the know, the TBB does this by default upon exciting when using the standard setup.

Unfortunately TBB does not yet delete flash cookies. Upstream ticket:

https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/3974

Read full topic
item.source: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!

item.title: Betterprivacy addon is dead , click&clean addon born!
item.dc:creator: anonymityISright
item.description:
Thanks for reply.

Ego:

the TBB does this by default upon exciting when using the standard setup.

  • If using adobe flash plugin with TBB that may consider non standard setup of TBB.
    I write for flash cookies LSO’s , not for browsing data and history, click & clean addon can do that betterprivacy can do,
    On whonix documentation recommended betterprivacy addon for TBB if flash plugin is installed (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Browser_Plugins), for deleting flash cookies.

Read full topic
